name: The claw (KimiNako, Johen.sound)
description:
Have fun with this little game! There are a lot of references.
Will you find the Easter egg?

*****************************************

The claw is a little game about finding all combinations!

          Controls:

Left and right arrow keys: Move the claw

Down arrow key: Active Push button

Mouse click on buttons: Do the chosen action

          Programming and Graphics:

Kimi : Itch.Io, Twitter, Facebook


         Music/Sound design:

JohenSound: Itch.io, Twitter, SoundCloud,  Portfolio
